pages.text: Ai lifu, lia mu, mi mu [alabo yu san ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] shi congzhong shijie de zhu [an la] jiang shi de, qizhong queshi wuyi.

Nandao tamen yao shuo:““Gulanjing” shi ta [mu sheng] weizao de ma?” Bu,“gulanjing” shi cong ni [mu sheng] de zhu jiang shi de zhenli, yibian ni jinggao zai ni zhiqian meiyou renhe jinggao zhe daodaguo de minzhong, yibian tamen zunxing zhengdao.
Shi an la zai liu rinei chuangzaole tiandi wanwu, ranhou sheng shang baozuo. Chu ta wai, nimen jue meiyou renhe baohu zhe he qiuqing zhe. Nandao nimen hai bu jieshou jiaohui ma?
Ta chuli zi tian zhi di de shiwu, ranhou, naxie shiwu jiang zai yi rinei shangsheng dao ta nali. Na yi ri de changdu, shi nimen [zai chenshi] suo jisuan de yiqian nian.
Zhe shi quanzhi yiqie kan bujian zhi wu [zhu] he kan de jian zhi wu de zhu [an la],[ta] shi quanneng de, shi te ci de.
Ta wanshan tasuo chuangzao de wanwu, ta zuichu yong nitu chuangzaole ren.
Ranhou, ta yong wuyong de jingye de jinghua chuangzao ta de houyi.
Ranhou, ta [an la] yunchen di chengxing ta [ren], bing ba linghun chui ru ta de tinei. Ta wei nimen chuangzaole er [tingjue] mu [shijue] xin [siwei], dan nimen hen shao gan'en.
Tamen shuo:“Dang women [si hou] xiaoshi zai dixia shi, nandao women zhen de hai yao bei fuhuo cheng yige xin de shengming ma?” Bu, tamen zai fouren [houshi] yu tamen de zhu xiang hui [zhu].
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Fengming guanli nimen siwang de tianshi jiang shi nimen siwang, ranhou, nimen dou jiang gui dao nimen de zhu nali qu.”
